title: Mathematics Project-Based Learning Design to Improve MOOC Instructional Design Quality

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts and online learning experience
context.additional_context: Work-linked project implementation for working professionals, operated with a focus on personal device usage and formative assessment.

learning_goals: Learners can identify five quality evaluation criteria for MOOC instructional design.
Learners can analyze the content organization and delivery system of a mathematics MOOC using lecture survey tools.
Learners can propose three or more instructional design strategies to enhance learner engagement in project-based learning environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
